definition: plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: That's when I started leaving those yellow post-its on the door.
sentences.chinese: 也就在那时候开始，我会在门上贴那些黄色便条。

sentences.english: One woman handed me a note the teacher had sent home with her child.
sentences.chinese: 一位妇女递给我一张教师托孩子带回家的便条。

sentences.english: She tore it open and fished out a note the same size as the first one.
sentences.chinese: 她将它拆开，拿出一张与第一封信一样大小的便条纸。

sentences.english: I have obtained the favour that the bearer has a short note from Charles to his wife.
sentences.chinese: 已蒙批准让送信人给查尔斯之妻带去一便条。

sentences.english: In the fourth year of our word-driven, wordless contact, a note arrived.
sentences.chinese: 经过四年的文字和无声的联系，我收到了一张便条。

sentences.english: John read the note over and over in a dumbfounded way.
sentences.chinese: 约翰愣愣的把这张便条看了又看。

sentences.english: Please take the note to the teacher.
sentences.chinese: 请把这个便条送交老师。

sentences.english: He prevailed on the lieutenant to send in a short note.
sentences.chinese: 他说动那个副官，递上了一张简短的便条进去。

sentences.english: John was about to enter the room when he was brought up(short) by a note on the door.
sentences.chinese: 约翰正要进房间时看见门上有一个便条，就怔住了。

sentences.english: On the market gutty and OK nail note in board go up leave a message board very good with.
sentences.chinese: 市场上有种可以把便条钉在板上的留言板就很好用用。

sentences.english: 'Put mother rabbit in a different place from the little rabbits, ' the note began.
sentences.chinese: 便条一开始就说，母兔和幼兔要放在不同的地方。

sentences.english: How about those Post-it Notes that get stuck just about everywhere these days?
sentences.chinese: 至于最近，那些到处贴的立可贴便条纸呢？

sentences.english: Set a time limit and come up with as many ideas as you can, one per sticky note.
sentences.chinese: 设定时限，尽量相出各种点子，每个点子一张便条纸。

sentences.english: That's twice I forgot to take slips from the library counter.
sentences.chinese: 我已经是第二次忘记从图书馆的柜台上拿些便条纸了。
在圣诞节后给你写感谢的便条。

sentences.english: He carelessly glanced through the note and got away.
sentences.chinese: 他马马乎乎地看了那张便条就走了。
